name: .MIPROJECT File Extension
summary: Learn about .MIPROJECT files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open MIPROJECT files in Mine-imator Version 1.1 and above (Windows) by selecting the Open project button that appears when you start the program or selecting the folder icon that appears in the program's menu bar.

If you are having trouble opening a MIPROJECT file in Mine-imator, or you want to examine the text contained within a MIPROJECT file, you can also open it using any text editor, such as Microsoft Notepad (Windows), Apple TextEdit (Mac), or GitHub Atom (cross-platform).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
